summary: This document is an email chain from September 2019 discussing a Netflix series about Jeffrey Epstein. A prosecutor is informing a colleague that a friend who is an executive producer on the series wants to see if anyone from the office would give an interview, acknowledging the answer is likely no.

events.title: Email about missed office visit
events.description: An individual stopped by an office on Thursday and Friday but did not catch the recipient, proposing to chat on Monday.

events.title: Discussion about Netflix Epstein series interview request
events.description: An email is sent informing a colleague that a friend who is an executive producer on an upcoming Netflix series about Epstein wants to see if anyone from the office would give an interview.

keyFacts: A Netflix series about Jeffrey Epstein was in production and scheduled for release in a few months as of September 2019.
The series had reportedly been in development for 18 months before Epstein was charged.
The executive producer of the series sought an interview with someone from the prosecutor's office, though the expectation was the answer would be no.
The correspondence indicates internal office coordination regarding media inquiries related to the Epstein case.
